桋字的基本解释

桋
yí
古书上说的一种树，叶细而歧锐，皮理错戾，多丛生于山中，木材可做车辋：“山有蕨薇，隰有杞桋。”

桋
tí
〔桋桑〕初生的小桑树。

桋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》以脂切，平脂，以。］
木名，即赤梀。
[②]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
嫩而长的枝条。

桋字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桋； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页525第12
【唐韻】以脂切【集韻】【韻會】延知切，?音夷。【說文】赤梀也。【詩·小雅】隰有杞桋。【草木疏】梀，葉如柞，皮厚而白，其木理赤者爲赤梀。一名桋木，堅韌，今人以爲車轂。　又【集韻】【韻會】?田黎切，音題。女桑也。樹小而條長。【爾雅·釋木】桋桑，女桑。

桋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
桋字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，叶细而歧锐。也指初生的小桑树。

桋
Basic explanation of words
桋
yí
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, with thin and sharp leaves and wrong skin. Most of the trees grow in the mountains. The wood can be used as a car rim: "There are ferns in the mountains, and vines in the mountains"
桋
tí
〔Sang mulberry〕 A young mulberry tree.
桋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with fat, flat fat, with. ]
The name of the wood means Chizhe.
[②]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
Tender and long branches.
桋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桋; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 525 No. 12
[Tang Yun] Cut with Zhi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Extend knowledge and cut,? Yin Yi. [Said the text] Chi Chi also. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Xi has qi 桋. [Sparse vegetation] The leaves are like tussah, the skin is thick and white, and the wood is red. A shoki, tough, today people think of a car hub.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Tian Liqie, phonetic title. The female mulberry. The tree is small and long. [Erya Shimu] Sang, female.
桋
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan

Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China

Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
桋
Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, the leaves are thin and sharp. Also refers to the young mulberry tree.
yí, tí
сущ.
1) yí * кастанопсис (дерево)
2) tí низкорослое и раскидистое тутовое дерево
